get.summary: Retrieves all institutions registered in the database.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size for pagination.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The attribute to order by. Possible values are 'name', 'city', 'zip', 'canton' and 'publish'.

parameters.name: orderDir
parameters.description: The sort order. Possible values are 'asc' and 'desc'.

post.summary: Synchronizes institutions with an Apache Solr backend.

parameters.name: solr
parameters.description: Name of the Apache Solr configuration to use.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the collection to synchronize with.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the institution that should be deleted.

get.summary: Retrieves all jobs that are currently active. Non-administrator users can only see Jobs that belong to them.
Retrieves all jobs that are currently inactive (job history). Non-administrator users can only see Jobs that belong to them.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job that should be aborted.

get.summary: Retrieves the job log for the provided job ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job for which the logs should be retrieved.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page index (zero-based) for pagination.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size  for pagination.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job that should be started.

put.summary: Uploads a KIAR for the given job.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Job for which a KIAR should be uploaded.

get.summary: Lists all available parses available for entity mapping.
Retrieves all the details about an entity mapping.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the entity mapping that should be retrieved.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the entity mapping that should be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the entity mapping that should be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the participant to delete.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new participant. Must be unique!

post.summary: Attempts a login using the credentials provided in the request body.

get.summary: Performs a logout for the currently logged-in user.
Checks and returns the status of the current session.
Returns information about the currently logged-in user.
Lists all available Apache Solr configurations.

post.summary: Creates a new Apache Solr configuration.

get.summary: Retrieves all the details about an Apache Solr configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Apache Solr configuration that should be deleted.

delete.summary: Deletes an existing Apache Solr configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Apache Solr configuration that should be deleted.

put.summary: Updates an existing Apache Solr configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Apache Solr configuration that should be updated.

get.summary: Lists all available job template types.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job template to retrieve.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job template that should be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job template that should be updated.
